message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200. This is a great deal, considering its value to me is at least $150.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value you place on the product, but I think we can come to an agreement closer to my budget. I am willing to pay $120 for the product.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that $200 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. Let me see if I can meet you in the middle. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $175. This is a fair price considering its value to me, and I think it's a great compromise.

Hello Alice, thank you for considering my budget. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $150 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise between your valuation and my budget.
